section.title: Provisioning of the proxy1 node
section.para: In this section we show how to provision the PROXY node.

Make sure Puppet RPM's are available:
&proxy1p; yum install puppet-dmsat1 . . ================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ================================================================================ Installing: puppet-dmsat1 noarch 0.1.1-1 example-puppet-structure-6u5-1_0 8.6 k Installing for dependencies: puppet-baseinfra noarch 0.1.1-2 example-puppet-baseinfra-6u5-1_0 42 k puppet-structure noarch 0.1.1-4 example-puppet-structure-6u5-1_0 5.6 k . . &proxy1p; rpm -qa | grep puppet puppet-3.4.3-1.el6.noarch puppet-structure-0.1.1-4.noarch puppet-dmsat1-0.1.1-1.noarch puppet-stdlib-0.1.1-1.noarch puppet-baseinfra-0.1.1-2.noarch .. note, versions may differ ..
